EmailTemplate.subject: LINK TO RECORDING: Coffee With Kelly - ePCR
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Coffee with Kelly - ePCR Link to December 12 Recording The December 12 topic was: How to trace a Billing Reconcile issue through ePCR History DATE: Every Second Wednesday of the Month TIME: 11:30 AM ET l 10:30 AM CT l 9:30 AM MT l 8:30 AM PT PRESENTER: Kelly Wachal - TriTech Supervisor of Customer Service and Education INVITE OTHER RESPOND SOFTWARE USERS: Forward this link: http://offers.tritech.com/CwK-ePCR_Registration.html <http://offers.tritech.com/CwK-ePCR_Registration.html>
See you next month! WEBINAR RECORDING RECORDING LINK <recordings.tritech.co/IA/Customer/CwK/ePCR/12-12-12.wmv>
﻿
